createAgentFromTemplate.description: Creates an agent from a template

props.name: templateVersion
props.description: The template version ID to create the agent from

props.name: agentName
props.description: The name of the agent (optional, a random name will be assigned if not provided)

props.name: tags
props.description: Tags to assign to the agent

props.name: tag
props.description: Tag name

props.name: memoryVariables
props.description: Memory variables to assign to the agent (key-value pairs)

props.name: toolVariables
props.description: Tool variables to assign to the agent (key-value pairs)

props.name: initialMessageSequence
props.description: Initial sequence of messages to start the agent with

props.name: content
props.description: Message content

props.name: role
props.description: Message role

props.name: name
props.description: Optional name of the participant

props.name: identifierKey
props.description: External, user-generated identifier key of the identity

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the identity

props.name: identityType
props.description: The type of the identity

props.name: projectId
props.description: The project ID of the identity (optional)

props.name: properties
props.description: List of properties associated with the identity

props.name: key
props.description: Property key

props.name: type
props.description: Property type

props.name: value
props.description: Property value (for JSON type, enter valid JSON string)

getIdentities.description: Searches for identities in your Letta Project

props.name: identifierKey
props.description: Filter by identifier key

props.name: name
props.description: Filter by identity name

props.name: identityType
props.description: Filter by identity type

props.name: projectId
props.description: Filter by project ID

props.name: limit
props.description: Maximum number of identities to return

props.name: input
props.description: The message content to send to the agent

props.name: maxSteps
props.description: Maximum number of steps the agent should take to process the request

newAgent.description: Triggers when a new agent is created

newMessage.description: Triggers when an agent uses send_message
